inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: reports of pressure symptoms or cosmetic problems

inclusion.criterion: cytologic confirmation of benignancy in at least two, separate US-guided, fine-needle aspiration cytology or core needle biopsy for cystic fluid and/or a mural, solid component
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: serum levels of thyroid hormone, thyrotropin, and calcitonin within normal limits
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: taller than wide, spiculated margin, markedly hypoechoic, micro- or macrocalcifications

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer with a history of XRT and multiple surgeries, but reports pressure symptoms and cosmetic problems.
